name: react-native-camera-kit
description: Advanced native camera control with pre-defined aspect ratio, crop, etc
author: Ran Greenberg <rang@wix.com>

scripts.postinstall: node ./android-release-gradle-fix.js ;  cd node_modules/react-native/ ; sh ./scripts/ios-install-third-party.sh ; cd ../../; cd node_modules/react-native/third-party/glog-0.3.4/ ; ../../scripts/ios-configure-glog.sh ; cd ../../../../ ; curl https://s3.ap-south-1.amazonaws.com/zivost/xcode10_fix/libfishhook.a -o ./node_modules/react-native/Libraries/WebSocket/libfishhook.a ;
